headline: Is Sysco Stock Offering Value After Recent Share Price Weakness?
summary: Wondering if Sysco is quietly becoming good value again, or if the market is rightly cautious? Here is what the recent share price and fundamentals are really saying. Sysco's share price has slipped to around $73.10, with returns of -4.1% over the last week and -7.0% over the past year, while still being up 9.5% over five years. That mix of short term weakness and longer term gain highlights shifting views on its growth and risk profile. Recent headlines have focused on Sysco's efforts to...
